Smart Toothbrush: A toothbrush with sensors that can detect the pressure and angle of the bristles while brushing, and provide feedback to the user on how to improve their brushing technique. This will help users brush more effectively and reduce the risk of gum disease and cavities.

Toothbrush with Built-in: A toothbrush that comes with a built-in electric toothpaste dispenser, making it easy to dispense the perfect amount of toothpaste onto the bristles without having to worry about running out.

Toothbrush with-Cleaning: A toothbrush that comes with a built-in electric toothpaste dispenser and a cleaning mechanism that cleans the bristles after each use, making it easy to keep the toothbrush clean and hygienic.

Toothbrush with Built-in-Timer: A toothbrush that comes with a built-in timer that reminds the user to brush for the recommended two minutes, ensuring that they brush for long enough to effectively remove plaque and bacteria from their teeth.

Toothbrush with Built-in-Smart-Brushing-App: A toothbrush that comes with a built-in smart brushing app that tracks the user's brushing habits and provides personalized feedback and recommendations on how to improve their brushing technique. This will help users brush more effectively and reduce the risk of gum disease and cavities.
